products.title: Classic Crewneck
products.description: A standard fit tee made from 100% mid-weight cotton. Pre-shrunk and durable for daily wear.
products.descriptionHtml: A standard fit tee made from 100% mid-weight cotton. Pre-shrunk and durable for daily wear.

products.title: Straight-Leg Chinos
products.description: Functional trousers featuring a four-pocket design and a slight stretch for comfort.
products.descriptionHtml: Functional trousers featuring a four-pocket design and a slight stretch for comfort.

products.title: Everyday Pullover
products.description: A classic fleece-lined hoodie with a kangaroo pocket and ribbed cuffs. Designed for a relaxed fit.
products.descriptionHtml: A classic fleece-lined hoodie with a kangaroo pocket and ribbed cuffs. Designed for a relaxed fit.

products.title: City Overcoat
products.description: A weather-resistant trench coat with a button-down front and adjustable wrist straps. Standard knee-length silhouette.
products.descriptionHtml: A weather-resistant trench coat with a button-down front and adjustable wrist straps. Standard knee-length silhouette.
